org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple

Class SimpleRiverSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.strategy.simple.SimpleRiverSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiverSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColumnRiverSource

    public class SimpleRiverSource
extends Object
implements RiverSource
    Simple river source. The simple river source iterates through a JDBC result set, merges the rows into Elasticsearch documents, and passes them to a bulk indexer. There are two channels open, one for reading the database, one for writing.

        public boolean nextRow(ResultSet results,
                       org.xbib.keyvalue.KeyValueStreamListener listener)
                throws SQLException,
                       IOException
        Get next row and prepare the values for processing. The labels of each columns are used for the ValueListener as paths for JSON object merging.
        Specified by:
        nextRow in interface RiverSource
        Parameters:
        results - the result set
        listener - the listener
        Returns:
        true if row exists and was processed, false otherwise
